website_summaries.verdict: Great-looking disc from the official manufacturer for Ultimate Frisbee, all offered at a nice price point.
pros: You can pick from four different styles of disc
Great for all kinds of Frisbee games, including Ultimate
High-quality construction will allow you to throw the disc with plenty of control for any kind of game
cons: Artwork on the disc doesn't wrap around onto the edges, leaving them white

customer_reviews.title: Heads Up
customer_reviews.text: Just a quick heads up for folks like me shopping for disc golf discs. While it is a really nice Frisbee, it is NOT a disc golf disc. It states that it falls under "Disc Golf" which it does not. Again, cool Frisbee, but not a putter for disc golf, which it claims to be. Side note* - Discraft makes golf discs, good ones at that, I wish they would have called out that this is not for golf somewhere in the description.
customer_reviews.author: Tasnova

customer_reviews.title: My hobby
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun to look at disc with the great flight you'd expect. Been throwing a disc around for 46 years. Once was laughed at in Santa Cruz because I had a regular 175g disc on the back of my truck while parked at a disc golf course. I proceeded to whoop ass on 3 other guys who had the full golf disc sets. That IS one of my favorite days - ever.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: You either think this is the best frisbee ever made, or you are wrong.
customer_reviews.text: America. I gave it 5 stars but it cracked around where the graphic is, so i'd unfortunately recommend not getting this one. It looks awesome though, I almost want to give it another try.
customer_reviews.author: Randolph

customer_reviews.title: The items weight was heavier than expected.
customer_reviews.text: The disc was much heavier than I expected. It was difficult to throw evenly or very far due to the weight. My grandchildren- ages 5,8 & 10 - found it difficult to handle and eventually refused to play with it. The eagle & US Flag picture on the top was very clear and beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They should call this disc "Maverick"
customer_reviews.text: The frisbee design that I decided to go with was the Yin-Yang-Tiger-Dragon design. I would have have given this 5 Stars already even if the disc had shown up bent or broken...design alone. Not only is this the coolest looking disc I've ever owned; it is by the far the coolest disc I have ever seen and flies truer than any other disc I've ever thrown. No kidding: this frisbee is awesome. I have played ultimate for a few years and have never had a disc fly so well. Every single person I've tossed with compliments the flight path of this bad boy. Sick disk.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Awesome frisbee
customer_reviews.text: Just got this discraft 175 gram Frisbee and it's excellent. The plastic is just the right hardness. It's not too soft to be flimsy and not to hard to leave a bruise on your fingers from catching it. It's also great for tipping because it has some give to it. Way better than the Wham-o Frisbee I ordered at the same time, which is as hard as a rock and not the quality Frisbee they use to make. Plus the discraft is made in the USA!!
customer_reviews.author: c.p.

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Its still an all around great Disc and is great for play but product does not appear as pictured. There is a disclaimer in the item description that overlooked stating that its a White base with a decal on the top. It is not a solid tie-dye disc. Do not purchase if you want this for a collectible item. Great disk. gave me a refund bc i was unhappy with the way it looks. 5/5
customer_reviews.author: cmccarty0724

customer_reviews.title: Lame print on white disc
customer_reviews.text: Misleading! The pic looks as though the whole disc is colored. It’s not. It’s a lame print slapped on a white disc. Had I known this - I would have picked something else. This product should NOT be Amazon’s choice.
customer_reviews.author: QuackDaddy

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite Frisbee's
customer_reviews.text: This Frisbee is so fun to throw and does amazing lifts in the air and seems to hover in front of the receiver as if breaking the laws of gravity. Great simply great!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew G. Oddly

customer_reviews.title: I thought those was going to be an LED, use-in-the-dark frisbee
customer_reviews.text: But it's a basic piece of plastic with a cheap print on it. Yet, when I searched for a LED light up in the dark frisbee, this item came up. Not what I was paying for at all.
customer_reviews.author: Product Buyer 00007

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy, big sticker on a white frisbee
customer_reviews.text: picture is deceiving thinking the whole disc is the cosmic look, but its really just a white frisbee with a sticker like thing on it. Sending back, not up to expectations.
customer_reviews.author: kall

customer_reviews.title: Image of product is not what you get!
customer_reviews.text: The product that you receive is a whit frisbee with print on top. The image makes you feel like you are getting a full colored frisbee. NOT TRUE
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Does not look as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this product 3 stars because it does not look as advertised. The design is the same, but it is not stretched out over the entire frisbee. The frisbee is white and the design is just on the top. The rim/edges/back are all white.
customer_reviews.author: Joylyn Ruffin

customer_reviews.title: Good Frisbee
customer_reviews.text: My rating loses one Star because it came weirdly packaged and The frisbee was basically bent. I ended up sitting a galion jug of water on top of it and after a few days it went back to the correct shape. Works well just didn't like how my kids couldn't use it right away from it being mis-shaped at first.
customer_reviews.author: Cramer

customer_reviews.title: NIce gift for someone
customer_reviews.text: As it was not for me and it was for my friend and he doesnt have complains about it im ok and giving 5 star. i havent used it but im doing 5 start because he is happy so im ok with that
customer_reviews.author: Zeke

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and a large diameter disc! Not for kids.
customer_reviews.text: These are large discs not like the small regular amateur frisbees. This heavy and large frisbee takes a while to learn to throw it. I have big hands but there still is a learning curve. The designs are great but rub off easy. the price is right. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: rnman

customer_reviews.title: Good for the Price
customer_reviews.text: This is a good weight for a disc, but the weight distribution seems off. For under $13 it's a fine bargain, but there are much better discs out there.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Miller

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I’m no professional frisbee player, but this is a beautiful frisbee and works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Solargirl

customer_reviews.title: Very cool frisbee!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this frisbee for my boyfriend for an anniversary gift and he loved it. We enjoy throwing it around at the park, it’s a lot of fun. I’m a beginner and I find it very easy to throw. The design is also very cool ( I got the dragon and tiger one).
customer_reviews.author: MoniLuv

customer_reviews.title: great frizby
customer_reviews.text: its pretty good but some may have problems maneuvering it if you've never used one of these before.
customer_reviews.author: Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great all around disc.
customer_reviews.text: The disc feels great in your hand and is perfect for ultimate or just throwing around the park, goes right where you want it and is easy to control the curvature of the disc. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Cade Doonan

customer_reviews.title: Picture is misleading
customer_reviews.text: Functionally it’s the only brand to use, but I was. VERY disappointed when I opened the box to find that it’s just a white disk with the graphics laser printed on the top. The picture online is misleading and makes you think the whole disk is that design. If I’d known this, I 100% would’ve purchased a different frisbee.
customer_reviews.author: Nash Birnholz

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Good weight. Stands up well to our very teething puppy.
customer_reviews.author: Modesto Rosa

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 will buy again.
customer_reviews.text: It seriously is that nice. I've never seen a frisbee fly like it. 100ft throws are easy. When it is thrown up accidentally at a wierd angle it will almost flatten itself out before it hits the ground. Like, seriously the nicest Frisbee I've thrown.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Love these frisbees!!
customer_reviews.text: My boys and I play ultimate frisbee with these regularly and find them very easy to throw across different ages and very durable. Just be a little gentle on them in sub-freezing temps :-)! We cracked one batting it down in a heated game of ultimate last winter, but that was a pretty extreme situation. If you want to have great fun at night, try the Nite Ize LED frisbee of similar quality/size.
customer_reviews.author: Chill

customer_reviews.title: Starscape looks cheap IRL.
customer_reviews.text: Starscape is a picture printed on the top of a white disc. Definitely not as pretty as it looks on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Awesome graphics, not for Disc Golf!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful disc! I just wish the manufacturer put more detail into the listing. This IS NOT a Disc Golf disc, which I assumed it was. This is a dinner plate sized Frisbee. Still a very nice disc.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Christen

customer_reviews.title: Not for disc golf!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is not a disc golf disc, but is a nice Ultimate disc, which I understand that would be ultimate Frisbee and that is a licensed name, but I had been searching disc golf discs and this popped up and was labeled disccraft so I was confused.
customer_reviews.author: M. Pfeiffer

customer_reviews.title: Great Disc, but Graphic is just overlayed on a white disc.
customer_reviews.text: The Disc is an ultrastar so it's great. However I thought the entire disc would be colorful top and bottom. That's not the case here. The top is just an overlay graphic. On the rim and underside the disc is just plain white. Not a problem with the disc. I just wasn't expecting that. If the whole disk was made out of colorful/tie dyed plastic would have been awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Morton

customer_reviews.title: Ultimate (Boyfriend) Frisbee Approved
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this disc for my boyfriend who's on an ultimate team. He loves the disc (maybe because I got it for him OR that the disc is a Discraft). The picture you see online is pretty close to what it looks like in person. The decal doesn't wrap along the side of the disc like it seems it would, but the decal that is there is great. Super clear and clean image. I bought the galaxy printed disc, who doesn't like galaxy print, right?
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Gray

customer_reviews.title: Great Frisbees
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for one that didn't feel so cheap and that would fly predictably. They nailed it with this frisbee. Happy customer
customer_reviews.author: Darrel Gosnell

customer_reviews.title: Not fully covered with design front and back
customer_reviews.text: I did not like that i over paid for a decal sticker. If the entire frisbee was the constellation design as advertised, there wouldn't be a problem. Literally an overcharge for a cheap looking sticker.
customer_reviews.author: christy cieboter

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This Frisbee seemed strong, nice design and good quality. I haven't played with it outside but the first feel of it at home seems absolutely good.
customer_reviews.author: A Tirk

customer_reviews.title: Nice color and artful design on the cover
customer_reviews.text: It’s a frisbee so we’re having fun with it. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Angela A.

customer_reviews.title: Its big and heavy. Quality made. Piece of art work !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ten stars, I love it. I'm going to order 2 more. It's really heavy.
customer_reviews.author: vangoghaquariums

customer_reviews.title: cheep
customer_reviews.text: Return. I purchased disc for my high-schooler. We expected better quality. This is just cheep plastic disc. The disc only has a printed image on the top. The disc itself is solid white. Notice in the add there are not multiple images and angles. Better to just buy a plain white for less money. Lesson learned read reviews.
customer_reviews.author: MOM

customer_reviews.title: good but decieving
customer_reviews.text: super awesome graphics! it looks amazing! its 175g good quality! the only thing is the graphics dont cover the whole disk. it stops on the curve and then its just white on the lip and underside! its not a sticker, its actually the color of the plastic, just wished it covered the whole thing..
customer_reviews.author: Corey Biggs

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy build with a softer plastic. Glides really well and I love the pattern. Overall it's awesome! Pros: Sturdy Softer Plastic (won't destroy your finger tips) Grip ring on top Glides well Cons: It WILL taco eventually. (Become malformed) However this happens with EVERY ultimate disk so realistically there are no cons!
customer_reviews.author: Dylan P. Bergold

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't look as pictured
customer_reviews.text: It's not a bad Frisbee, but when you hold it in your hand, it doesn't look like what it does in the advertised pic. It's a white disc with the design printed on, and has a huge white margin around the outside. The back is white. I think they don't post other views of the disc on purpose. I'm not going to return it, but I doubt I would have bought it if I knew it looked this way. Pretty lame, Discraft.
customer_reviews.author: Kate P Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great Frisbee, but doesn't look it.
customer_reviews.text: Feels and flies great, just was disappointed with the design. It is basically a sticker over the top which is fine, but it doesn't go all the way down the sides. There is a 3/4" white strip on the bottom edge that just looks bad and make it look cheap. I will buy this brand again but I will stick with the classic ones.
customer_reviews.author: JimmyQ25

customer_reviews.title: Happy to find a colorful regulation weight disc
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my best friend’s fiancé for Xmas. He plays ultimate. He LOVED it!!
customer_reviews.author: Ali K

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: It looks like a frisbee and flies like a frisbee so it does what it is supposed to do......
customer_reviews.author: Bustoff

customer_reviews.title: Image not accurate.
customer_reviews.text: It's a frisbee. Weight is roughly accurate. The design you see for the product image is wildly inaccurate. Wish I had just bought a plain frisbee because it's pretty bad... Like real ugly. But it's a frisbee so I'll just paint this disappointment and call is a day.
customer_reviews.author: Scott m.

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: This looks nicer in the picture. It is a white frisbee with the colors painted on it. I think it looks as if it is red or blue plastic but it is not. It is still a high quality frisbee, but it could be much nicer. I can see that after a few uses, the pretty graphic will be scratched off.
customer_reviews.author: April Jarrett

customer_reviews.title: Great frisbee disk
customer_reviews.text: Super fun disk. Really soars. Just right for tossing around with friends at the park.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Bastin

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The Galaxy Color is only on the top and is completely white on the bottom and sides
customer_reviews.author: Ram

customer_reviews.title: Off-center printing
customer_reviews.text: Normally I check reviews on products, but I thought "It's a frisbee, what could possibly go wrong?" Well, if I had checked, I would have learned that the print does not cover the entire disc, and that there is nothing (just white) on the bottom. More problematic was that the print was slightly off center. This means that when you throw it, the disc appears to be wobbling unsteadily through the air. It's disconcerting.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Frank

customer_reviews.title: Great for humans, not as good for dogs
customer_reviews.text: Great frisbee. Flies straight and has a good weight to it. As many of the reviews say, isn't great for dogs, their teeth punch right in. (I don't have a dog, but the first time I took it out a good boi got a hold of it and took off with it)
customer_reviews.author: Symone Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Discraft is great brand and he loved the color pattern
customer_reviews.text: Our teenager is into Extreme Frisbee, and is quite accomplished. Discraft is great brand and he loved the color pattern!
customer_reviews.author: M. Holmes

customer_reviews.title: All around a good frisbee!
customer_reviews.text: This frisbee throws real well! Very controllable. All around a good frisbee!
customer_reviews.author: chris b.

customer_reviews.title: This thang sucks. It's a decent frisbee but the print is ...
customer_reviews.text: This thang sucks. It's a decent frisbee but the print is only on top and ends abruptly. Weak sauce.
customer_reviews.author: Chud el Spudley

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This damage is after about 15 minutes of playing frisbee with my dog (a labrador). The disc is all bent, has multiple teeth holes and not flying properly anymore. Dont recommend it for big dogs.
customer_reviews.author: aneta

customer_reviews.title: Noice
customer_reviews.text: Started to warp under play, but easily bent back. Most of the mass is distributed along the outer rim, so throws can be easier, but different from what a seasoned Ultimate Sports Disc vet would expect. But this means the middle area is less stiff and easily bent.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Disc!
customer_reviews.text: My son and I both play ultimate and we love this disc! It's an official Discraft Ultrastar with nice balance & feel. Awesome American Eagle print.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Alton

customer_reviews.title: Good for MacGyvering
customer_reviews.text: It sucks as a Frisbee, but we used it for the bottom of a gravity water station for our animals. They like it
customer_reviews.author: LR Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Great disc!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful and flies straight. My son and I had a great time throwing about 30 yards apart. One of the best discs I've ever used. The picture seems to indicate a solid black disc but ours was while with the print shown covering the entire top. This will be perfect for hot summer days!!
customer_reviews.author: Tommy in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Great Addition to the Disc Collection.
customer_reviews.text: Me and my brother frequently play frisbee. We got really addicted to the game last summer and started a little collection of frisbees. The disc itself feels great. It's not too light, not too heavy. Flies well and it simple to use for anyone. Plus, Discraft has some awesome designs.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Christiansen

customer_reviews.title: Ugly print design
customer_reviews.text: Real ugly. I already own the glo frisbee and wanted to get a new less scratched up disc. I love the way the simple discs have the design inlayed into them. This design is a cheap flat print on top of it, and it doesn't even wrap around. This isn't the quality I would expect from discraft. Good news is I went to return it and get a refund so I like the way Amazon works with easy processes. Now I just have to get a newer one.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Design is just a decal that only overs part of the frisbee
customer_reviews.text: The product picture is misleading. The design doesn't cover the whole frisbee as shown in the listing.
customer_reviews.author: Snowbird

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: Love these so much, me and my coworker use these daily for performances and entertainment! Great durability, distance, and accuracy
customer_reviews.author: Nate J.

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: Discraft is a brand that you can't go wrong with. I've had this for a season of Ultimate Frisbee and it flies well and hasn't suffered any warping, but I gave this product three stars because it is pretty misleading. The color doesn't cover the whole disc, only the top. If you took this picture at any other angle you'd see the white rim and bottom. The design on the top is cheaply printed on. When my friend threw it in a gym floor it literally left a stamp on the floor when it landed on its head.
customer_reviews.author: Jay B.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this Frisbee. Discraft are such top quality and the design is even better! Need to actually pick up another since everyone in my family wants to steal mine!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley_RZD

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but heavy
customer_reviews.text: Little heavy to toss. Probably not the best for a 3 year old or his granny.
customer_reviews.author: marilyn

customer_reviews.title: The one you want
customer_reviews.text: If you're playing Ultimate or just tossing around with friends and family, it's the brand you want, the weight you want at a price that is hard to beat. Just a solid choice that can't go wrong. Unless you choose the wrong color. If you're playing Ultimate especially with experienced players, pick basic white as that's the color of choice. In any case, have fun!
customer_reviews.author: Tom Yu

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Okay, but a bit heavy and awkward to throw. Then again, I have small hands.
customer_reviews.author: TEAS Prep

customer_reviews.title: Flys for days!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is heavy and will fly very far! Just watch out... It will take a fingernail off! It is heavy! I would not suggest this for kids which is why I bought it. If you hit your kid in the head with it I promsie that his shoes will fall off from getting hit so hard.
customer_reviews.author: Clinton and Paige

customer_reviews.title: We gave this to our 13-year-old nephew for his birthday ...
customer_reviews.text: We gave this to our 13-year-old nephew for his birthday. He loves it! He said that he's used it every day since he got it.
customer_reviews.author: Kreditor

customer_reviews.title: Not for the pooches
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my dog's long time frisbee after it uh, had an accident. It flies nicely but she tore right through this. WILL NOT LAST FOR DOGS
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Boatwright

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor toy
customer_reviews.text: With all the tech gadgets my kids love to play.I decided to introduce them to what their dad had to play as a kid.They enjoy playing frisbee with their dad now.This frisbee flys great.Great toy for outdoor family play.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Gentry

customer_reviews.title: Photo is inaccurate!
customer_reviews.text: The image pictured is not the same disc. The actual disc has a white rim. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: d33shot

customer_reviews.title: Not for disc golf
customer_reviews.text: Not a certified disc for disc golf. It is too big for legit disc golf but still nice
customer_reviews.author: the stig

customer_reviews.title: liked this product
customer_reviews.text: For myy first frisbee I've got that's not a crappie plastic prize, I've really enjoyed it. The design on the top gets a little scratched up but that's expected when you throw it on pavement. I have really enjoyed fine tuning my skills as I throw it with my friends hours on end
customer_reviews.author: Bassline

customer_reviews.title: Frisbee4Life
customer_reviews.text: The image portrays this frisbee to be completely covered by the image. Only the top has image, rest of frisbee is white. That is my only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: IcedOutJimmy

customer_reviews.title: Patriotic AF. Let it be known your pride for ...
customer_reviews.text: Patriotic AF. Let it be known your pride for your country by throwing a red white and blue eagle disk across the sky.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Looks and works great!
customer_reviews.text: Like the color and design a lot. Good weight. Nice frisbee. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Pen name 76

customer_reviews.title: Flys Great!
customer_reviews.text: A perfect disc. Flys great...looks great. Will be buying more of these as they were out and/or get damaged. After a couple weeks we did take a chunk out of it when it hit a fence...but it's still flying well.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to see on a bright day.
customer_reviews.text: Would have liked this disc alot better if the color was throughout but the bottom is plain white.
customer_reviews.author: MattPC

customer_reviews.title: inaccurate picture
customer_reviews.text: the pic shows the whole disc covered in the artwork but when i got mine its missing on the sides....little disappointed. but otherwise works great
customer_reviews.author: Don Zito

customer_reviews.title: It’s a sticker...
customer_reviews.text: I was not happy to find out that the inside is pure white... it’s like a sticker on the outside. And not a very great quality one at that.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Quality, sturdy, accurate.
customer_reviews.text: Son loves it. Beat the crap out of it and it's still operational a year later. Amazing what a "good" Frisbee/Disc can do. Never knew...
customer_reviews.author: L. P

customer_reviews.title: Flies great. Print does not cover whole top of frisbee ...
customer_reviews.text: Heavy. Flies great. Print does not cover whole top of frisbee but doesn't take away from its overall appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Joe b

customer_reviews.title: Good learning frisbee!
customer_reviews.text: Wish the entire frisbee was like the picture. Only the top is printed, the rest is white. This is a stiffer frisbee but still great.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Deuel

customer_reviews.title: Maybe False advertising?
customer_reviews.text: I decided it was okay to pay extra for the sick starscape design, but what the picture shows is slightly deceiving. The entire disc is not galaxy, only the top. The side and bottom of the disc is white. This was pretty disappointing as i expected it to be completely colored, and that is why i gave it the 3/5. That said, it still flies great and i wont be returning it or anything. Just letting future buyers know that it is not fully colored.
customer_reviews.author: Omelette

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The wrong frisbee was initially sent but this company sent the correct one and let me keep the other frisbee as well! Iove tossing both. The sky styler is a disc that I really never tried to throw, it is great along with the Ultimate.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Good ultimate frisbee disc. Not for disc golf.
customer_reviews.text: This ultimate Frisbee disc is great for what it was intended for, ultimate Frisbee. The only reason I gave this a 4 and not a 5 is because I bought it with the intention of it being a disc golf driver.
customer_reviews.author: cody

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome frisbee, good weight
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome frisbee, good weight. I am a novice and can throw this pretty well. The only bummer is that the decal is a little off-center which makes it look cheesy.
customer_reviews.author: Bernadette D.

customer_reviews.title: Great frisbee
customer_reviews.text: Best frisbee I’ve ever used. Super easy to throw straight and it’s a good price too.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Grochowski

customer_reviews.title: He has been very happy with all of them
customer_reviews.text: We have ordered quite a few Discraft discs from Amazon. My 14 year old grandson is an avid disc thrower and does many trick shots with them. He has been very happy with all of them, this one being no exception. This has always been his "go to" brand. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Esther Gendron

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: slightly lighter than I thought.... or less dense I would say
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: This frisbee is very durable and thick. It is ...
customer_reviews.text: This frisbee is very durable and thick. It is very colorful and has a creative design that catches people's eyes. Although the frisbee has picked up many scratches from me using it has still not cracked and is very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Carissa Brikken

customer_reviews.title: A great gift, especially for anyone with any appreciation for Korean symbology
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous colors; well made. Great gift for someone who really likes frisbee play. Delivered very quickly. Price is quite fair, given the quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: LimaBN

customer_reviews.title: Sides are white.
customer_reviews.text: Looks kinds cheesy, not nearly as cool as the picture looks. Also, the sides of the disc are white. Where the picture stops on the photo, that's where the design stops.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S. Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Falsely advertised
customer_reviews.text: Not as advertised. The actual plastic is not colored it is a cheap paint . Looks cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny simmons

customer_reviews.title: This is a scam
customer_reviews.text: This is a scam. It is not a disc it’s a damn frisbee. How is this allowed to be sold. The description is false.
customer_reviews.author: amy caldwell

customer_reviews.title: great but not what i wanted
customer_reviews.text: I gave this disc 3 stars only because I thought while ordering it that it's intended perpose was for disc golf. It turns out that this disc is an ultimate Frisbee. However great disc just a little upset it was under the disc golf category.
customer_reviews.author: Steffen M.

customer_reviews.title: Murica!!!
customer_reviews.text: One word... Murica. Love this disk. Lost my last one and was distraught without it! Missed it so bad I had to buy another one, going to buy some more as gifts!
customer_reviews.author: btdubs

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: its a good disc, i just thought it would be the pattern all around
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really colorful
customer_reviews.text: Still have it and always will really fun to play with
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Nice disc
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality disc, larger then expected but throws well and glides nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Janet W.

customer_reviews.title: Good Disc
customer_reviews.text: i ordered 2 separate discs but from the same company, same weight, brand, style, etc.; only difference was the design covering. for some odd reason the other one (UV Ultrastar) flies better....weird. still a great disc! we just play for fun when camping.
customer_reviews.author: hockeymom

product_meta.title: Discraft 175 Gram Super Color Ultra-Star Disc
product_meta.description: Aggressive into the wind, Hornet's place in the hive is between Wasp and Drone. Not crazy overstable, but no sissy either. You'll be surprised by the amount of glide Hornet generates. Originally the 2010 Ace Race prototype.
feature_bullets: The world standard for the sport of Ultimate
Official and exclusive disc of the USA Ultimate Championship Series since 1991.
Listed among the 31 things all men should own by Esquire magazine
Note: The disc is white with a printed pattern on the disc
